title: MythicMobs显示刷屏
author: MCdie_die
txt_content: [MythicMobs] An error occured while parsing a drop table. Enable debugging for a stack trace

replies.txt_content: 是不是修改过mythicmobs的掉落表？是掉落表问题

replies.author: Mixne
replies.txt_content: 打开droptables里面的ExampleDropTables，把里面的东西全部删除，然后保存，游戏输入/mm r

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: 掉落表读取错误 或许你可以打开Debug模式查看日志 在config文件

replies.author: YunLu
replies.txt_content: 掉落配置文件有问题，要么仔细看看哪里改错了，要么直接把配置文件删了
